law.catch_line: Required notifications by state agency when declining entitlement to federal funds.
law.text: No state agency entitled to federal funds which would represent one hundred percent (100%) of the cost of a program in which the state participates shall decline to accept or receive that entitlement without notification to the state budget director and the Interim Joint Committee on Appropriations and Revenue.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 387, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1994.
